text: Télétoon+ (formerly Télétoon) is a French pay television channel for children aged 2 to 12, owned by the Groupe Canal+. ==Logos== File:Télétoon 1996 logo.png|Télétoon 1996-2004 == History == Télétoon was first launched on December 16, 1996 from Télévision Par Satellite. In 2007, TPS merged with its competitor Canalsat. In 2016-2017, Télétoon+ became a Canal+ exclusive all around the world to celebrate the channel's 20 years. It is also distributed on VOO in Belgium and Teleclub Les + in Switzerland. ==Programmes on Télétoon+== ===Original programming=== * Club Nelly 2002-2004 * Eutcekoi 2012-2013 * Le Grand Défitoon 2015-2018 * Le Loto des Toons 2008-2010 * Le Toon Mystère 2004-2007 * Mais où est passé Giorgio ? 2011-2012 ===Acquired programming=== * Anatole Latuile 2019-présent * Angel's Friends 2017-2019 * Angelina Ballerina (2001-2006) * Atomic Betty 2014-présent * Babar (1989-1991) * Barbapapa (1974-1977) * Barbapapa Around the World 1976-1979 * Bear in the Big Blue House 1998-2014 * Beyblade 2017-présent * Bébé Lilly: Les Aventures de mon Coffre à Jouet 2009-2017 * Caillou 2003-2012 * Cinderella 2019-2022 * The Fairly OddParents (moved to Nickelodeon France) 2005-2011 * Franklin (1997-2004) * Heidi, Girl of the Alps 2020-2022 * The Hoobs 2004-2007 * Jewelpet 2009-2010 * Jewelpet Twinkle 2018-2019 * Kaeloo 2013-présent * Kirarin Revolution 2006-2007 * Kirby: Right Back at Ya! 2002-2005 * Magical DoReMi 1999-2002 * Maya the Honey Bee 1998-2020 * Moero! Top Striker 1996-1999 * Rainbow Bubblegem 2008-2009 * The Rainbow Fish 1996 * Rolie Polie Olie 2001-2004 * Shugo Chara! 2008-2010 * SpongeBob SquarePants (moved to Nickelodeon France) 1999-2001 * Sushi Pack 2011-2019 * Tokyo Mew Mew 2016-2019 * The Wiggles (TV Series 2-3) 2004-2013 * Winx Club 2005-2018 * Yakari (2005-2017) * Zoé Kézako 2005-2006 * Z-Squad 2008-2015 ==References== Category:Television channels in France == appearance country teletoon+ == countries appear disappear France December 16, 1996 TBA Kenya January 23 , 2010 TBA Canada March 29 , 2013 April 23, 2024
title: Télétoon+
